headline: Postal service plans to open last-mile delivery network to more shippers in money-raising move
summary: The U.S. Postal Service said Wednesday it intends to open its “last-mile” delivery network, the most expensive part of the shipping process, to large and small shippers, expanding beyond current arrangements with giants such as Amazon and UPS.  The postal service expects to accept bids in late January or early February from other shippers, which will propose their own mix of volume, price and delivery timing.  The agency will award contracts later in 2026, based on where it can provide same- and next-day delivery service at a profit.

The postal service expects to accept bids in late January or early February from other shippers, which will propose their own mix of volume, price and delivery timing.  The agency will award contracts later in 2026, based on where it can provide same- and next-day delivery service at a profit.

headline: Amazon Names New AI Chief Amid Battle to Take on Tech Rivals
summary: Peter DeSantis will lead the new group, Amazon Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said Wednesday in a message to employees, which was also posted on the company’s corporate blog.  The new organization will combine Amazon’s Artificial General Intelligence team — which oversees the company’s Nova-branded AI models and the digital brains of the Alexa voice assistant — with Amazon’s chipmaking unit and quantum computing research.

headline: Amazon shakes up AI team as veteran Prasad leaves, DeSantis promoted
summary: Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another ​taking over a more expansive group that includes AI models, custom silicon ‌and quantum computing.  The move comes just two weeks after the Amazon Web Services annual cloud computing conference ‌in Las Vegas, which the company has turned into a showcase for AI tools and services.  Amazon has been working to shake a reputation that it is trailing competitors like Google, Microsoft and OpenAI in developing AI models.

headline: Dave Ramsey Says He Made A Record $300M In 2025 – 'God's Been Good To Me'
summary: Dave Ramsey has become one of the wealthiest and most well-known personal finance figures in the U.S. By the age of 26, he was earning about $250,000 a year and had built a net worth of roughly $1 million, only to lose it all when his highly leveraged real estate investments ran into trouble. After declaring bankruptcy, he rebuilt his finances and became a leading financial educator.
